org.openimaj.logger

Class LoggerUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.logger.LoggerUtils

  • public class LoggerUtils
extends Object
    Make using log4j slightly less awful
    Author:
    Sina Samangooei (ss@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Method Detail

      • prepareConsoleLogger

        public static void prepareConsoleLogger()
        Prepare a console logger with a default layout. This allows Logger instances to be used while still being useful as the line to prepare logger can be removed and the default log4j.properties will be correctly listened to.
